meanings.definition: Covered with rounded swellings or blisters
meanings.sent1: The bullate leaves on the plant felt bumpy to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The bullate surface of the bubble wrap provided extra cushioning.
meanings.sent3: The bullate texture of the cake made it look like a mini mountain range.
meanings.sent4: Her skin after being in the hot sun all day resembled a bullate landscape.
meanings.sent5: The bullate appearance of the clouds made them look like fluffy pillows in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having a blistered or bubbled appearance
meanings.sent1: The bullate skin on the burn was painful to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The bullate bubbles on the boiling soup indicated it was ready.
meanings.sent3: The bullate surface of the water made it look like a giant bubble bath.
meanings.sent4: The bullate texture of the lava flow resembled a bubbling cauldron.
meanings.sent5: The bullate appearance of the soap foam made it look like a fluffy cloud in the sink.
